title: Ho3+ codoping of GGAG:Ce: a detailed analysis of acceleration of scintillation response and scintillation efficiency loss
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,23129-23138
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA02866J, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Juraj Páterek, Pavel Boháček, Bohumil Trunda, Vladimir Babin, Richard Švejkar, Karel Jurek, Jan Rohlíček, Martin Nikl
In this study, we investigate the effects of Ho3+ codoping on the luminescence and scintillation properties of GGAG:Ce, with a particular focus on timing properties and scintillator efficiency.
